WHO.title: Plastikaweb
WHO.position: Freelance FrontEnd Developer living in Barcelona.
WHO.description:
For more than 10 years I have been dedicated to web development, lately focused in angular and typescript.
I try to make my work socially responsible and bring the most advanced technologies to people.

skills.angular:
Angular, version 2 and above, implemented with Typescript

Experience with:

  • Angular Material2 and Teradata Covalent
  • ngrx/store // RxJS
  • firebase // angularfire2
  • NGX-Translate
  • NGX-Charts
  • Unit testing
  • Animation System
skills.javascript:
ECMAScript 5.1, ES6 and Typescript

Experience with:

  • native javascript
  • jquery
  • DOM manipulation
  • async javascript
  • functional programming
skills.CSS3:
Standard CSS3

Experience with selectors, transformations, transitions, flexible box or flexbox design.
skills.Responsive Web Development:
Twitter Bootstrap

Experience with media queries, mobile first approach and components configuration.
skills.Sass:
Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets

Using variables, nesting, mixings...

Compass.
skills.HTML5:
HyperText Markup Language

Semantic web standards.

Experience with related APIs (video, audio, drag and drop, canvas, svg).
